content.description: Source: United States Bureau of Labor Statistics
content.question: Which of the following best explains an effect on the United States economy by the patterns depicted in the maps?

choices.label: Federal programs were created to reduce levels of unemployment.
Spending on defense industry work increased in order to create more jobs.
Wages for working and middle class people began to stagnate.
New technologies increased access to information and communication.

content.answer: Wages for working and middle class people began to stagnate.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
